quest_royal_sacrifice.title: Royal sacrifice?
quest_royal_sacrifice.summary: Grace will become sacrificed by the wizard Ardor to gain ultimate power from the God Ulrog. Something seems to go wrong and everything gets engulfed in flames, including Ardor and you.

quest_a_helping_horse.title: A helping horse
quest_a_helping_horse.summary: A fallen tree has blocked the road to Honeywood Forest. Lennor needs your help to get a strong horse and some tow ropes if you want to speed up the process of clearing the road.

1.taskPhrase: Bring a strong horse to Lennor.

13.taskPhrase: Let the tree be dragged out of the way.

2.taskPhrase: Horse Enopa is sick. Maybe Elenora, the elder's wife, can help with some medicine.

8.taskPhrase: Angie won't let Enopa go without horseshoes. She says there must be some around. Go find or make 4 of them.

3.taskPhrase: Elenora needs some ingredients for the medicine. Get 6 herbs for her.

4.taskPhrase: For the medicine also 1 blue jelly is needed, which can be extracted from a Blue Slime. Luckily Elenora spotted one in town.

9.taskPhrase: [Optional] Exchange 1 gold and 2 metal for 1 horseshoe with the blacksmith.

quest_honeywood_inn_price-1.title: Pest removal
quest_honeywood_inn_price-1.summary: The innkeeper of Honeywood has a problem with some unwanted visitors upstairs. Her guests don't want to stay at her inn as long as these bats are roaming free. She would very much appreciate it if you could get rid of them.
